name: BLACKOUT (GLoDas_Laboratories)
description:
Blackout is a short platformer prototype I made for college. It´s made with free use art, a friend of mine made the music and I am the responsible for the coding and the design.

It´s the first time I finish making a videogame, so I expect you to enjoy it and to give me feedback if possible. I know the jump is kinda weird, but it was the best I could do in the time I was given. Thanks for playing!

If you wanna follow/contact me:

Twitter: @GLoDas_
